Html: I am working on a multi graph environment where we let the users pick a series from one graph and paste the series on the other graph. How can i achieve this feature functionality?

Which part of this process do you need help with?

  • Identifying which series the user wants to copy.
  • Finding the "selected" series data
  • Copying the data to the clipboard
  • Pasting the data from the clipboard to another graph

Are the graphs in the same program/process?

I can already identify the series when the user clicks on it, but I need to enable them to be able to drag the series to another chartplotter in the same process. I guess what I am asking is which classes to I have to know well to achieve this.

The chart plotters are in several tabs.
